data.persona: I am better and smarter than a raven. I see more than he. I know so much.
data.description:
You are in the bone pit.
Grungy and damp, a hole in the ground filled with remains of the fallen. A pungent odor rises from the opening, warding off anyone nearing the area. Ivory spikes with brownish red tips line the outside of the pit.
There's two remains and two spikes here.
The flies is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to use the spike to intimidate the raven
data.mid_motivation: I want the raven to acknowledge my strength
data.long_motivation: I want everyone to know I am better and smarter than the raven
